lines.i: The common notion of "procedure" is broader than that specified by the HL7 Version 3 Reference Information Model (RIM). Therefore procedure templates can be represented with various RIM classes: act (e.g., dressing change), observation (e.g., EEG), procedure (e.g. splenectomy). This clinical statement represents any procedure that cannot be classified as an observation or a procedure according to the HL7 RIM. Examples of these procedures are a dressing change, teaching or feeding a patient or providing comfort measures.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:10519 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.12"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8289)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet MoodCodeEvnInt 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.18 STATIC 2011-04-03 (CONF:8290)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8292)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:8293)
SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProcedureActStatusCode 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.22 DYNAMIC (CONF:8298)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:8299)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] priorityCode, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ActPriority 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.16866 STATIC (CONF:8300)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] performer (CONF:8301)
Such performers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity (CONF:7720)
Such performers assignedEntity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:7722)
Such performers assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:7731)
Such performers assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] telecom (CONF:7732)
Such performers assignedEntity SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] representedOrganization (CONF:7733)
Such performers representedOrganization, if present, SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:7734)
Such performers representedOrganization, if present, MAY contain zero or more [0..*] name (CONF:7735)
Such performers representedOrganization, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:7736)
Such performers representedOrganization, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] telecom (CONF:7737)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] participant (CONF:8311, CONF:8312, CONF:15599)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Service Delivery Location (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.32)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:8325)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Contains exactly one [1..1] Instructions (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:8328)
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Contains exactly one [1..1] Indication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:8329)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:8314)
Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:8316)
Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:8315)
Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] encounter (CONF:8317)
This encounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ENC" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8318)
This encounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:8319)
This encounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:8320)
This encounter MAY satisfy: Set the encounter ID to the ID of an encounter in another section to signify they are the same encounter. (CONF:16849)
code in a procedure activity observation SHOULD be selected from LOINC (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) or SNOMED CT (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96) (CONF:8294)
code SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] originalText (CONF:15596)
originalText, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15596)
reference, if present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15597)
reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15598)
entryRelationship with target class encounter SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:8316)
participant with target class Service Delivery Location SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="LOC" Location (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 HL7ActRelationshipType) STATIC (CONF:8312)
entryRelationship with target class Instructions SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:8324)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8289)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet MoodCodeEvnInt 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.18 STATIC 2011-04-03 (CONF:8290)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8292)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:8293)
SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ProcedureActStatusCode 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.22 DYNAMIC (CONF:8298)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:8299)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] priorityCode, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ActPriority 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.16866 STATIC (CONF:8300)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] performer (CONF:8301)
Such performers SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity (CONF:7720)
Such performers assignedEntity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:7722)
Such performers assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:7731)
Such performers assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] telecom (CONF:7732)
Such performers assignedEntity SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] representedOrganization (CONF:7733)
Such performers representedOrganization, if present, SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:7734)
Such performers representedOrganization, if present, MAY contain zero or more [0..*] name (CONF:7735)
Such performers representedOrganization, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:7736)
Such performers representedOrganization, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] telecom (CONF:7737)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] participant (CONF:8311, CONF:8312, CONF:15599)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Service Delivery Location (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.32)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:8325)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Contains exactly one [1..1] Instructions (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:8328)
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Contains exactly one [1..1] Indication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19)

Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)

Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:8316)
